title: How To Run a Python Script on MacOS, Windows, and Linux
author: Jessica Wachtel
description: Learn how to run Python scripts on macOS, Windows, and Linux with this practical guide. Master command-line execution, IDE shortcuts, scheduling scripts, and more.
cntitle: 如何在 MacOS、Windows 和 Linux 上运行 Python 脚本
